column3: “Great strain. If there's ever been a strain to help me take on a stressful day with a positive attitude, it's this one. I am more inclined to converse, I do get hungry and I maintain a relaxed demeanor. A well deserved 5 stars from me 💚”
“Is it really a sativa? I cant get up from my coach wtf”
“Tasty, floral and a nice looking bud. A nice boost not a head melter but definitely not on the weaker end of the spectrum.”

“Real Dry On The First Pull...,
But Then A Sweetness Concludes It Well🤗

Satisfying Strain 💪🏽”
